Detailed Description

an interface for connecting to and managing a single Propeller device.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

PropellerSession::PropellerSession ( QString  port,
int  reset_gpio = -1,
bool  useRtsReset = false,
QObject *  parent = 0 
)
Parameters
portA string representing the port (e.g. '/dev/ttyUSB0', '/./COM1').
reset_gpioEnable GPIO reset on the selected pin. The default value of -1 disables GPIO reset.
useRtsResetUse RTS for hardware reset instead of DTR; overridden by reset_gpio.
PropellerSession::~PropellerSession ( )

Close the PropellerSession; this function is called when the PropellerSession is destroyed.
